name: Creepy Evil Plush HorrorTime
description:
it's game Creepy Evil Plush Scarytime
Hairy Puppy Horror Playgame is a blue monster who live in a big house and it's your time to kill him and save the house
How to play ?
- 3 chapters with different tasks .
- find object and get out of the house to win the level .
- kill the blue puppy at the end to win the game .
- play carefully and don't forget the timer .

Good luck
